abstract: Digital campaign ad for Conner Eldridge, Democratic Senate candidate from Arkansas, offers potential strategy for fellow Democrats by linking his Republican opponent to series of Donald J Trump's least flattering remarks.
lead_paragraph: A new ad acts as a warning to Republican candidates sharing a ticket with Donald J. Trump: A vow to support him may be used as Democratic cudgel.

headline.main: In Arkansas, a Preview of Democratic Attacks to Come
headline.print_headline: In Arkansas, a Preview of Democratic Attacks

snippet: A new ad acts as a warning to Republican candidates sharing a ticket with Donald J. Trump: A vow to support him may be used as Democratic cudgel.
